I could only find \u003ccode\u003ePDPSim\u003c/code\u003e, but we use a \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e - will \u003ccode\u003ePDPSim\u003c/code\u003e work for simulating the \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003ePDH\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"REV's Power Distribution Hub\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e with 24 channels? Panel\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e simulation works with 24 channels it’d work
